When we talk about in debugging in R, there is a slight negative aspect in people who work on python based and other programming IDEs. There are some useful functions in R itself like 




f <- function(a) g(a)
g <- function(b) h(b)
h <- function(c) i(c)
i <- function(d) "a" + d
f(10)
